abstractText: Scale samples are collected from a sample of natural origin juvenile Chinook salmon (CHN) and steelhead trout (STH) are taken to estimate age composition. NOAA recommends that to demonstrate ESU/DPS viability, annual documentation of a variety of biological parameters (including juvenile abundance, age distribution, sex ratio, length, and run timing) is needed at the population, major population grouping, and ESU/DPS level for each listed species (Crawford and Rumsey 2011). Detailed instructions for this method are provided below:
title: Obtaining scales from juvenile steelhead and Chinook salmon v1.0
